Class Controller

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

      • Controller

        public Controller(CronosPanel associatedPanel,
                  Application associatedApp)
        The constructor
        Parameters:
        associatedPanel - The CronosPanel associated with this controller
        associatedApp - The Application in which this Controller resides. It can be set to null if there is no need for the Controller to associate itself with the Application in which it belongs
